title: 安装多个模组后建立新世界时崩溃，求解决方案
author: StBruce
txt_content:
没有在启动时中途崩溃，但在建立新世界的时候崩溃了
我是在整合包基础上删改，删除自定义npc和茶风，添加超能力怪物，史诗攻城，rwbym，精英怪，收藏馆之后崩溃的
ps：我看不懂报告，但如果是rwbym的问题，能否保留该mod而通过删除其他mod解决该问题
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
WARNING: coremods are present:
  llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar)
  CustomSkinLoader ([皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.10a.jar)
  iceandfire (【冰火】iceandfire-1.8.3.jar)
  CorePlugin ([超能力]AcademyCraft-1.1.2.jar)
  NetherPortalFixForgeLoadingPlugin ([防卡地狱门]NetherPortalFixForge-1.0.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.2.0.jar)
  AstralCore (【星辉】astralsorcery-1.12.2-1.10.15 (1).jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([优化]FoamFix-0.10.5.jar)
  HCASM (HammerCore-1.12.2-2.0.6.13.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([一键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge
// But it works on my machine.
